solution_line_template: If the 30-day pass costs ${pass_cost}, then I should take at least ${pass_cost}/${one_way_ticket_cost}=<<{pass_cost}/{one_way_ticket_cost}={rides_for_equal_cost}>>{rides_for_equal_cost} rides to pay the same as a one-way ticket

However, given that we want the 30-day pass per ride to be strictly cheaper we should ride at least {rides_for_equal_cost}+{additional_ride_for_strict_cheaper}={minimum_rides_for_strictly_cheaper} times
